ygData.subject: Re: Spider silk mask
ygData.msgSnippet: Good base for a high level are the following: Fishbone Earring Electrun Sapphire Earring BP Necklace Spider Silk Mask (think a named spider in Karana s drops)
ygData.messageBody:
Good base for a high level are the following:

Fishbone Earring
Electrun Sapphire Earring
BP Necklace
Spider Silk Mask (think a named spider in Karana's drops)
Executioer's Hood
BP Ring
BP Ring
Serpentine Bracers
Azure Sleeves
Lupine Claw Guantlets
Foreman's Tunic
Cloak of Shadows
Flowing Black Silk Sash
Drake-hide leggings
Wolf-fur Slippers

Even better, next step up from the above are the following (some of this
comes from the planes):

replace the serpentine bracers with Shiverback-hide Wristbands
replace the azure sleves with Shiverback-hide Armbands
replace the lupine claw guantlets with Guantlets of Fiery Might
replace the Foresman tunic with Shiverback-hide Jerkin
replace the Cloak of Shadows with the Cloak of Flames
replace the Flowing Black Sash with a Thick Banded Belt
replace the Drake-hide leggins with Shiverback-hide leggins
replace the wolf-fur slippers with Shiverback-hide boots

hope these help at least a little. Credit comes from
http://eq.stomped.com/monks/
Check out the Ultimate Monk link.

Subai
Fennin Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Imari J. A. Dellimore <ijad@...>
To: <EQ-monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 11:07 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Spider silk mask


> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> I am a level 35 monk and am seek advice from you higher ups out there
> about what equipment I should be seeking to get next. Specifically I
> wanted to get information on where and by whom the spider silk mask is
> dropped?
>
> Anyway here is my base equipment:
>
> wolf fur slippers
> werewolf claws
> lizard tribal mask
> mesh mantle (DAMN IT VERANT! MAKE A GOOD MONK SHOULDER PIECE)
> pair o black pearl rings
> black pearl necklace
> serpentine bracers
> exe hood
> white wolf cloak
> foreman's tunic
> aszure sleeves
> drake hide leggins
> purity belt ( <---- what should I replace this with? TBB is too rare
> anything else easier to get/trade for?)
>
>
> let me know what improvements I cna make (without haveing to go kill a
> dragon or wait till I am level 50 and go to the planes of FEAR/HATE)
>
>
> thanks
> aslam
>
>
